Posts.EditableText: I made a chat room for the forum (mostly so I can just whine, and ask what I'm doing wrong in the GUI.) It's free, and you don't have to sign up, so swing by! http://storytellersroom.chatango.com/
Posts.HTML:
I made a chat room for the forum (mostly so I can just whine, and ask what I'm doing wrong in the GUI.)

It's free, and you don't have to sign up, so swing by!

http://storytellersroom.chatango.com/

Posts.EditableText:
Arise chat room thread. 

So I stopped in here but no one was about. I'm wondering if people are interested in this, if they prefer a different chat room instead (Google hangout? IRC?). 

I think it would be cool to have an IRC-style Quest chat. Integrated with the forum maybe?

Posts.EditableText: Arise twice-risen thread! So as it turns out someone on the Intfiction forum made an IRC channel at Mibbit. You can connect here, http://client00.chat.mibbit.com/?channe ... mibbit.net It's not just about Quest, but that's OK since not very many people use it yet. If anyone here wants to chat about IF or Quest in particular, I'll be hanging out there when I'm online.
Posts.HTML:
Arise twice-risen thread!

So as it turns out someone on the Intfiction forum made an IRC channel at Mibbit. You can connect here,

http://client00.chat.mibbit.com/?channe ... mibbit.net

It's not just about Quest, but that's OK since not very many people use it yet.

If anyone here wants to chat about IF or Quest in particular, I'll be hanging out there when I'm online.
